# physics
country_event = {
	id = gft_tech_trade.10
	title = gft_tech_trade.10.name
	desc = gft_tech_trade.10.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_administrative_ai
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.10.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_administrative_ai
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_3_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_3
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_4_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_4
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_5_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_5
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_6_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_6
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_7_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_7
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_8_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_8
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_9_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_9
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_10_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_10
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_11_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_11
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_12_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_12
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_13_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_13
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
		}

	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = gft_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_13
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = gft_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_13
		}

country_event = {
	id = gft_tech_trade.12
	title = gft_tech_trade.12.name
	desc = gft_tech_trade.12.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_antimatter_power
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.12.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_antimatter_power
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_1_country_flag

					}

	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = gft_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_2

			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_5

country_event = {
	id = gft_tech_trade.13
	title = gft_tech_trade.13.name
	desc = gft_tech_trade.13.desc

	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_arc_emitter_1
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.13.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_arc_emitter_1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {

					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_4_country_flag

	option = {

		hidden_effect = {

				id = gft_tech_trade.9
			}
		}
	}
	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = gft_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_13
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = gft_tech_trade.14
	title = gft_tech_trade.14.name
	desc = gft_tech_trade.14.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_dark_matter_detection
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.14.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_dark_matter_detection
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {

			remove_global_flag = gft_technology_trade_now_global_flag

			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_1

			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_11

# society
country_event = {
	id = gft_tech_trade.15
	title = gft_tech_trade.15.name
	desc = gft_tech_trade.15.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_adaptive_bureaucracy
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.15.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_adaptive_bureaucracy
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_3_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_3
					}

country_event = {
	id = gft_tech_trade.16
	title = gft_tech_trade.16.name
	desc = gft_tech_trade.16.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_adaptive_combat_algorithms
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.16.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_adaptive_combat_algorithms
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {

					}

			else_if = {

	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = gft_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_13
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = gft_tech_trade.17
	title = gft_tech_trade.17.name
	desc = gft_tech_trade.17.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_capital_productivity_2
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.17.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_capital_productivity_2
		}

		name = gft_tech_trade.17.y
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_refit_standards
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_2_country_flag

						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_11
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_12_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_12
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}

		name = gft_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = gft_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_13
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = gft_tech_trade.18
	title = gft_tech_trade.18.name
	desc = gft_tech_trade.18.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_capital_productivity_3
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.18.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_capital_productivity_3
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_3_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_3
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_4_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {

						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_9
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_10_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_10
					}
					country_event = {

		}

	# 戻る
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.9.p
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = gft_tech_trade.9
			}
		}
	}
	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = gft_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_13
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = gft_tech_trade.19
	title = gft_tech_trade.19.name
	desc = gft_tech_trade.19.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_archaeo_pk_devolving_beam
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.19.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_archaeo_pk_devolving_beam
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {

					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}

	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = gft_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_13
		}
	}

# engineering
country_event = {
	id = gft_tech_trade.20
	title = gft_tech_trade.20.name
	desc = gft_tech_trade.20.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_afterburners_1
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.20.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_afterburners_1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_3_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_3
					}
					country_event = {

					}
				}

		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_2_country_flag

	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = gft_technology_trade_now_global_flag

			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_11

country_event = {
	id = gft_tech_trade.21
	title = gft_tech_trade.21.name
	desc = gft_tech_trade.21.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_advanced_metallurgy_1
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.21.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_advanced_metallurgy_1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {

					}

					}

	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = gft_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_2

			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_5

			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_9

	id = gft_tech_trade.22

	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_afterburners_2
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.22.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_afterburners_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {

	# 戻る
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.9.p
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = gft_tech_trade.9
			}
		}
	}
	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = gft_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_13
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = gft_tech_trade.23
	title = gft_tech_trade.23.name
	desc = gft_tech_trade.23.desc
	picture = GFX_evt_intelligence_report
	show_sound = event_activating_unknown_technology
	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_advanced_metallurgy_2
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.23.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_advanced_metallurgy_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_2_country_flag

					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}

			else_if = {

	option = {

				id = gft_tech_trade.9
			}
		}

	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = gft_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_13
		}
	}

	id = gft_tech_trade.24
	title = gft_tech_trade.24.name
	desc = gft_tech_trade.24.desc

	is_triggered_only = yes
	# tech_armor_hardeners_2
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.24.a
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_armor_hardeners_2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_1_country_flag

					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_3_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_3
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_4_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_4

					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {

						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_5

	# tech_titans
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.24.o
		trigger = {
			has_technology = tech_titans
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_1_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_1
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = gft_technology_trade_2_country_flag
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_2
					}
					country_event = {
						id = gft_tech_trade.1001
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {

				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						is_same_empire = event_target:gft_technology_trade_3

	# 戻る
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.9.p
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = gft_tech_trade.9
			}
		}
	}
	# 閉じる
	option = {
		name = gft_tech_trade.8.n
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = gft_technology_trade_now_global_flag
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_0
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_1
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_2
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_3
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_4
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_5
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_6
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_7
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_8
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_9
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_10
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_11
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_12
			clear_global_event_target = gft_technology_trade_13
		}
	}
